channel.title: APIGateway on My First Step
channel.description: Recent content in APIGateway on My First Step

item.title: AWS CDK(v2): Linking Lambda and APIGateway
item.description: I think that Lambda and APIGateway are a combination that is often used, but is complicated to set up in the management console. It would be great to be able to write this easily. Also, if you write Lambda in TypeScript, it automatically transpiles the TypeScript and installs node modules and packages them for you, so it’s quite easy to use. Preparation It is assumed that the following settings have been completed.
